Tolentino wants employers to give electricity allowance to work-from-home employees tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-745845 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/745845/tolentino-wants-employers-to-give-electricity-allowance-to-work-from-home-employees/story/ Senator Francis Tolentino on Tuesday said the burden of work-from-home employees must be alleviated by giving them incentives that would take into account the additional electricity expenses they shoulder while performing their jobs out of their offices. Philippines logs 1,540 new COVID-19 infections; total at 47,873 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-745836 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/745836/philippines-logs-1-540-new-covid-19-infections-total-at-47-873/story/ The Philippines on Tuesday logged 1,540 more coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) infections, of which 993 are "fresh" or newly validated and 547 are late, bringing the total to 47,873 Tue, 07 Jul 2020 16:19:29 +0800
Palace on Filipinos living with the COVID-19 pandemic: Sasayawan po natin tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-745838 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/745838/palace-on-filipinos-living-with-the-covid-19-pandemic-sasayawan-po-natin/story/ “Some will say, kinakailangan nating sayawan ang COVID-19 kasi sa Pilipino when you have to live with something, sayawan mo na lang. Yan po ang gagawin natin. Sasayawan po natin,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said. “We have to deal with COVID-19. We have to resume with our economy and at the same time protect our people.” Tue, 07 Jul 2020 16:09:48 +0800
